title: Martin Luther King, Jr. Memorial: Park Home
body: Out of the Mountain of Despair, a Stone of Hope  Located in downtown Washington, D.C., the memorial honors Martin Luther King, Jr.'s legacy and the struggle for freedom, equality, and justice.                Plan Your Visit   Find out where to go and what to do.        Building the Memorial   Discover how the memorial took shape.              Maps   Located along Independence Ave SW near the Lincoln Memorial and Washington Monument.        Quotations   Study Martin Luther King, Jr.'s quotes engraved in the memorial.        Volunteer   Help care for the memorial and share the story.
